page.title: 10THE ASTRAL CENTRE-BIRMINGHAM
page.content: THE ASTRAL CENTRE IS A COMMUNITY CENTRE ON CASTLE VALE ESTATE.ITS A PLACE WHERE PEOPLE MEET TO DO CTIVITIES AND JOIN CLUBS.IT CATERS FOR ALL AGE RANGES.THE CENTRE HAS BEEN OPEN SINCE 1968.THE BUILDING HAS 10 ROOMS AND A VARIETY OF EQUIPMENT. THE CENTRE IS OPEN EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK FROM 9.00 TO 22.00.THERE ARE 5 QUALIFIED PEOPLE WHO RUN THE CENTRE BUT OTHER PEOPLE DO VOLUTEER THEIR SERVICES FOR DIFFERENT CLUBS.THERE ARE OVER 30 CLUBS YOU CAN JOIN, RANGING FROM AIR-RIFLES TO DANCE TO SELF-DEFENCE. THEIR BUSIEST TIME IS ON WEDNESDAY TEENAGERS AND YOUNG ADULTS USE THE CENTRE THE MOST.THE MOST POPULAR CLUBS ARE KEEP-FIT AND YOUTH CLUB AND THE PLAYGROUP.
